title: Britain’s New Finance Chief Repudiates Prime Minister’s Signature Economic Plan
description: With Liz Truss’s authority ebbing, questions abound about how long she can cling to her post.

title: When Cemeteries Are Flooded, Where Do You Bury the Dead?
description: Record-shattering flooding has submerged cemeteries across much of Pakistan. Now, with deaths from flood-related diseases mounting, families are struggling with where to bury loved ones.

title: Rising Waters Again Force Evacuations and Spread Misery in Australia
description: In the southern state of Victoria, worst hit by the recent floods, officials warn that the danger will remain for weeks, with the ground already saturated.

title: Dressing Up
description: As the seasons change and more people return to in-person work, figuring out what to wear can be a challenge.

title: Doubts Over Indigenous Identity in Academia Spark ‘Pretendian’ Claims
description: Some Canadian universities now require additional proof to back up Indigenous heritage, replacing self-declaration policies.

title: Three Women of Bucha: Their Deaths and Lives
description: New reporting illuminates the fortitude of three women — a former public servant, an animal lover, a grandmother — who were victims of Russian brutality.

title: Beijing Turns Into a Fortress Ahead of the Communist Party Congress
description: The authorities in China have arrested a million criminal suspects, curbed travel to Beijing to keep Covid out, and deployed an army of neighborhood monitors.

title: Peter Thiel, Major U.S. Political Donor, Is Said to Pursue Maltese Citizenship
description: Obtaining citizenship in Malta would provide another passport for Mr. Thiel, who is one of the largest individual donors for the U.S. midterm elections.

title: U.S. to Send $725 Million More in Aid for Ukraine to Restock Ammunition
description: The military package does not include an air defense system.

title: At Least 28 Are Killed in Coal Mine Explosion in Turkey
description: The accident occurred in the northern province of Bartin. The country’s health minister said that 11 people were being treated.

title: Belarus Wavers as Putin Presses It to Join Ukraine War
description: The country’s strongman, Aleksandr Lukashenko, finds himself in a bind. He survives with support from Russia, but entering the fight could be ‘political suicide.’

title: Biden Authorizes an Additional $725 Million in Ukraine Aid
description: An air defense system is still not a part of the package, but that may be on the way soon.

title: Putin Defends Military Draft in Russia From Pro-War Criticism
description: The Russian president said the draft should be completed within two weeks.
